title: Looking for a duo queue partner, i am S1 and looking to climb to high gold
body:
I can mid lane or support. Im not very good at top, jg, adc. I am looking for someone that is fun to play with and has good game sense. I can discord or skype.  My summoner name is Joshablob. I have had a good winrate with akali and i also like to play viktor mid. If i get placed in supp, my go-to supp is janna or morgana.

Any role is wanted, but im not good at adc, jg, top

replies.body: Yeah man sounds like we are in the same pit. I am S2 pushing for high gold or low plat. Chuck me a request

Wow what luck! I found this post a few hours ago but forgot to reply. You seem like just the type of player I need. I am silver 4 right now, but I seem to be able to hold my own against gold players and platinum players. Anyway, I'd be glad to be your duo partner if you'd like! Hope you choose me, see you later and good luck summoner!

- Kaladin
can i duo with u ? i'm now silver 4
